medical_history.chief_complaint: Acute onset mid-abdomen pain associated with episodes of non-bloody, non-bilious vomiting and chills.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began at 9 PM after eating a veggie burger 3 hours prior. Episodes of similar abdominal pain have occurred intermittently over the past few months, lasting about ___ minutes each, with the last episode occurring approximately 3 weeks ago.
medical_history.past_medical_history: History of CAD status post RCA stent x2, hypertension, hyperlipidemia.
medical_history.family_history: Father died at age ___. Two brothers have had CABG at ages ___ and ___.
medical_history.social_history: Denies alcohol consumption for over ___ years; previously a binge drinker for a ten-year period.
